channel.title: General on Martin Jung
channel.description: Recent content in General on Martin Jung

item.title: New professional website
item.description: Welcome to my new starting website. My name is Martin Jung and I consider myself an Environmental and data scientist. Read here for more. I have abandoned my previous online presence, the Conservation ecology blog since quite a while. Mostly because I was too preoccupied working on my PhD. However I also disliked the inflexibility of wordpress layouts and the added advertising below each wordpress.com article. Therefore the restart of my professional website powered by hugo and the academic theme.
